articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Broadcom's $69 bln VMware deal wins provisional UK clearance - Reuters
articles.description: Britain's competition regulator provisionally cleared U.S. tech company Broadcom's (AVGO.O) $69 billion purchase of VMware
articles.content: LONDON, July 19 (Reuters) - Britain's competition regulator provisionally cleared U.S. tech company Broadcom's (AVGO.O) $69 billion purchase of VMware (VMW.N) on Wednesday, saying the deal would not … [+2058 chars]
